data.title: List of people from Bangalore
data.meta_description: Medical and Health Experts * Dr. H. Sudarshan graduated from Bangalore Medical College. Went on to win the Right Livelihood Award and Padma Sri for work with the Soliga tribe of Biligirirangan Hills. * Dr. Devi Prasad Shetty Cardiac surgeon * Dr
data.text:
Medical and Health Experts

* Dr. H. Sudarshan - graduated from Bangalore Medical College. Went on to win the Right Livelihood Award and Padma Sri for work with the Soliga tribe of Biligirirangan Hills.

* Dr. Devi Prasad Shetty -Cardiac surgeon

* Dr. S.S. Ramesh - Cardiologist

Scientists

* Sir M. Visvesvarayya, engineer and statesman

* Dr. Krishnaswamy Kasturirangan, astrophysicist, former Chairman of ISRO, member of Rajya Sabha

* Dr. C. N. R. Rao, Indian Institute of Science (Material Sciences)

*Dr. G. R. Nagabhushna, Former Chairman H.V Dept. H.V IISc, National Awardee

Kannada writers and Jnanpith awardees

* Dr. U. R. Anantha Murthy- Kannada writer,thinker and Jnanpith awardee

* Girish Karnad, Kannada writer, playwright, actor, Jnanpith awardee

* T. P. Kailasam, Kannada writer, playwright.

* K. S. Nissar Ahmed, Kannada Poet.

* Kuvempu Poet, Jnanpith awardee

* Da Ra Bendre Poet, Jnanpith awardee

* Sudha Murthy

* Masti Venkatesh Iyangar, Jnanpith awardee

Other writers

* Mahesh Dattani, English playwright and Sahitya Akademi award winner

* Anita Nair, English author of the books Ladies Coupe and Mistress

* Lavanya Sankaran, English author of The Red Carpet: Bangalore Stories

Entrepreneurs

* Azim Premji, India's richest man (as of 2004). Founder of Wipro Technologies

* Kiran Mazumdar, founder of Biocon, a bio-technology company

* N.R. Narayana Murthy, founder of Infosys

* Sabeer Bhatia, founder of Hotmail

* Bharat Goenka, founder, Managing Director of Tally Solutions

* Ramjee Chandran, founder, Managing Director of Explocity Group of magazines and websites.

* Subroto Bagchi, COO of MindTree Consulting

* Vijay Mallya, CEO of UB Group, owner of the Kingfisher brand.

* Captain G R Gopinath, Managing Director of Air Deccan

Sportspersons

Athletics

* Ashwini Nachappa, Former athlete

Badminton

* Prakash Padukone, Badminton player

Billiards

* Pankaj Advani, Billiards & Snooker World Champion

Cricket

* Anil Kumble, Leg Spinner, Test Captain, India's highest wicket taker

* B.S. Chandrashekhar, Retired Leg Spinner

* Erapalli Prasanna, Retired Off Spinner

* Shantha Rangaswamy, Former India Women's Cricket Team Captain

* Syed Kirmani, Retired Wicket Keeper

* Venkatesh Prasad, retired fast bowler,Current India"s Bowling Coach.

* Vijay Bhardwaj,

* Gundappa Ranganath Vishwanath, retired batsman.

* Roger Binny, all rounder

* Raghuram Bhat, left-arm spinner

* Dodda Ganesh, medium pacer

* Javagal Srinath, retired fast bowler, Match Refree

* Rahul Dravid, Former India Captain.

Hockey

* Jude Felix, former Indian Hockey team captain

* Ashish Ballal, Hockey goalkeeper

* Len Aiyappa, Indian Hockey Team

* Arjun Halappa, Indian Hockey Team

Swimming

* Nisha Millet, Asian swimming champ

Tennis

* Mahesh Bhupathi, Tennis player

Entertainers

Kannada & Indian Cinema

* Ambareesh, actor, 'Mandyada Gandu'

* Anant Nag, actor, brother of Shankar Nag

* Darshan, actor

* Deepika Padukone, model, actress

* Dwarkeesh, actor, comedian

* Hamsalekha, music director, lyricist, dramatist

* Prema, actress

* Puneet Rajkumar, actor, youngest son of Dr. Rajkumar

* Puttanna Kanagal, late director

* Raghavendra Rajkumar, actor, second son of Dr. Rajkumar

* Dr. Rajkumar, actor, singer, cultural icon

* Rakshita, actress

* Ramya, actress

* Ravichandran, actor, director, producer, music director, editor

* Shankar Nag, late actor, producer, director

* Shivaraj Kumar, actor, eldest son of Dr. Rajkumar

* Soundarya, late actress, also acted in other South Indian films.

* Sreenath, actor, Pranaya Raja, 'Shubha Mangala'

* Sudeep, actor

* Upendra, director, actor, producer

* Vasundhara Das, actress and singer

* Dr. Vishnuvardhan, actor, 'Sahasasimha', 'Abhinava Bhargava'

* Jagesh, actor

* Kashinath, actor

Other entertainers

* Lara Dutta, actress, Miss Universe 2000

* Lucky Ali, singer

* Manna Dey, playback singer

* Darius Sunawala Radio Jockey

* Aftab Shivdasani, actor

* Keerthi Reddy, actress

* Vasundara Das, singer

Architects

* K. Jaisim

piritual leaders

*Nataraja Guru

Others

* Shakuntala Devi - Popularly known as the Human computer

* R. K. Baliga, Founder of the Electronics City in Bangalore

* A. N. Prahlada Rao, Kannada crossword writer

See also
